cont.entity_a: Cut lines and smoothing are very well done. The mallet is sturdy, balanced, functional, and well crafted. Solid build and nice weight.
cont.entity_b: Very well made with a cast steel or iron center head. Made in the USA. Well constructed and handles all types of pounding needs.

cont.entity_a: Wood is too soft to be very durable, with each strike leaving a deep impression. Arrived with a big chip off a corner face.
cont.entity_b: Rubber head popped off during first use. Very durable with a non-marking side.

cont.entity_a: Narrow face and handle with insufficient weight.
cont.entity_b: Unique shape and weight balance, fitting into tighter spots. Made with a beautiful hickory handle.

cont.entity_a: Works well with chisels, adding heft and measured impact.
cont.entity_b: Great for hardwood flooring, used by professionals. Dual materials in one head with soft and hard heads.

cont.entity_a: Requires finishing with tung oil or polyurethane. Fit and finish were lacking, with rough areas needing sanding.
Perfect weight and fits well in hand for chiseling. Good balanced weight and easy to use.

cont.entity_b: White rubber side does not leave marks. Sturdy, hefty, and no-mar white side for delicate surfaces.
